#Help for the Maze block "turn right" and "turn left".

<screenshot1> <screenshot2>

||*Option*||*Description*||
||turn right||Turns Pegman to face *right* but doesn't move him a square in the new direction.||
||turn left||Turns Pegman to face *left* but doesn't move him a square in the new direction.||

 Tip: To move Pegman in the new direction, follow the "turn" command with a "move" command.
